tool_description: Checks DNS propagation status across multiple global DNS servers to verify that DNS changes have been properly distributed worldwide.

domain_name.description: Domain name to check for DNS propagation

record_type.description: DNS record type to check (A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT, NS)

expected_value.description: Expected DNS record value to verify against

check_locations.description: Specific geographic locations to check (US, EU, ASIA, etc.)

error_messages: Invalid domain format: Domain name must be a valid fully qualified domain name.
Unsupported record type: The specified DNS record type is not supported for propagation checking.
Invalid location code: One or more location codes are not recognized.
DNS query failed: Unable to query DNS servers in one or more locations.
usage: Provide domain name and record type to check. Optionally specify expected value and geographic locations to test. The tool queries multiple DNS servers and reports propagation status.

propagation_percentage.description: Percentage of DNS servers showing correct records

inconsistent_servers.description: DNS servers showing different or outdated values
